text: Vojtěch Jasný (30 November 1925 – 15 November 2019) was a Czech director. He won a Cannes Special Jury Prize for The Cassandra Cat (1963). He was born in Kelč in Moravia.John Wakeman, editor. "World Film Directors, Volume Two, 1945-1985". Pages 473-479. New York: The H.W. Wilson Company, 1988. Jasný died in Přerov, Czech Republic on 15 November 2019 at the age of 93.V Přerově zemřel "dobrý rodák" Vojtěch Jasný ==References== ==Other websites== * * Jasný's Faculty Profile at SVA *Vojtech Jasny - a filmmaker in different eras Category:1925 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Czech movie directors
title: Vojtěch Jasný
